documents.document: @MarinkaNYC It is flooding our news over here (Sydney). The world has gone mad.
@srpeatling I had to google 'corflutes'. Forgive me, I'm a kid's writer now
@truongthomas Fine. You created them, pay for them, raise them. Take the chocolate, buy some more tomorrow. Or don't.
What an astonishing story, what a gutsy guy - how white supremacist Derek Black grew up and left the fold. https://t.co/xIbgSjgz5L
@James_Jeffrey Awwww these are beautiful, and cheering me when all the news around is truly wretched.
@alexadsett Absolutely not. The little notes on the fridge with stray apostrophes will drive you nuts, otherwise.
@msmisrule Like you, I have a certain grudging admiration for the Joyce. At least he says what he means!
@msmisrule No - then he'd have to characterise himself as a dullard without ideas, and he certainly wouldn't do that.
@msmisrule They don't enjoy a debate. They just vote!
@msmisrule I take your point, but think he was saying most people want strong borders and those not in the inner city r too polite to argue
@msmisrule With all due respect, I don't think that's what Joyce was saying.
For me, the only bright spot in that election was finding @ananavarro. At least the world gets 4 more years of this: https://t.co/YPNFDLyfpL
@pryorlisa I feel sick he won't even be able to get the detention centre deal done now, and it was a breakthrough. What will you write?
@pryorlisa At this point, I just want to put my head in my hands and weep. This is all really, really bad.
@hornery I feel it's worse than that. I worry what it means for the freedom of the press under his presidency.
@murpharoo Kellyanne has taken back the twitter account
@James_Jeffrey I laughed, but I'm actually terrified.
@James_Jeffrey He's already tweeting against the right to protest, and the media? His presidential pose lasted what? 30 hours or something?
@pryorlisa I could go on, but it's all been said. I only hope it doesn't happen here and we can hold to the dull and sensible centre.
@pryorlisa People are trying to normalise this - too scary otherwise. He rants, makes threats, doesn't respect rule of law. Facism 101
@SamHarrisOrg Thanks, this is riveting, but also terrifying.
@srpeatling Taken with salt. How would he know, or anyone truly know? It's speculation with a loose cannon like DT.
@justinjmoses I know, meant, of course mood grim in Bk and manhattan. bet they're celebrating in the rustbelt! I think that's a good impulse
@justinjmoses Yeah it's bk. No one in bk wants this. Outside bk it's lots for Trump. Does it make you want to come back to Aus?
@justinjmoses How is it there? I see a protest on 6th ave, and the appointments in this crazy government beginning.
@pintadoguy not known yet. Struggling here. Feel the things we take for granted - rights of women, minorities, free press - under threat.
@WazMan01 I mean, wtf? I
@pintadoguy I am having a very, very bad day. Wha? How? WTF???
@EmilyGale You are a hard, hard taskmaster
@EmilyGale I like your trophy and award system. I might adopt it.
CNN starts the election marathon, I wonder: do the commentators wear adult diapers? If I had to talk for hours sans break, I'd want backup.
@katedetweiler we're half a world away but watching with bated breath! Tomorrow our daytime we bite our nails as the returns roll in. Oyyyy!
Exactly! Who is going to want to ride this again? https://t.co/Vb4tbStsQn
@srpeatling @ALeighMP @ellinghausen He obviously sprinted in after training. Go Andrew!
@raspratt brilliant - wish I'd witnessed that, and the skulk back with the wrong chicken.
@rglover702 @BernardSalt Seconded ... although why 'smashed'? Does the extra 's' allow cafes charge to $5 more vs 'mashed' avo?
@raspratt I know I'm asking for it ... but wha -? Now you have to tell the damn story.
@srpeatling Why is he looming behind her so often when she speaks? It's creepy!
@JacquelineHarve I can imagine she was. And just so normal. No bullshit, no apologies.
@JacquelineHarve I am so ridiculously damn sad about RW. Didn't know her personally but adored her on TV, and she was always in our local.
@katedetweiler ITA. That red is terrific.
I am so very happy that Clinton is wiping the floor with Trump. So very, very pleased.
@WazMan01 Way to talk yourself down, Brit! :) Come on, big yourself up!
Full text of Lionel Shriver's excellent Brisbane Writers Festival speech she's getting flak for: https://t.co/1RLxWfaSkV
@srpeatling my fave frock of the night. Bishop's was more glam but also more safe. This was terrific.
The Milingimbi Sustainability project is worth a look. Their Art Centre needs funds - Project https://t.co/MfXCpF26F3 via @gofundme
@suzanne_leal Running well, badly, who cares? You're a writer, not a runner. And @DavidDyerAuthor is indeed one of the loveliest!
@suzanne_leal a) I am so impressed you are up at the hour the sun suggests b) I am so impressed you are up at that hour AND running!
@altait No you're just gorgeous. Take that compliment. TAKE IT!! :)
Awww, heart officially warmed. https://t.co/mQQuLEfscx
Vile night in Bondi, but worth venturing out for Nib awards talk with @obmmusic @ErikOJensen and @jemmabirrell https://t.co/ZUfyxC1GX5
@rglover702 @MichaelPascoe01 Thanks! Just the bracing kick I needed after Brexit-bingeing and election-stat staring.
Excellent Gladwell podcast Revisionist History, Ep 1 linking former PM Julia with painter Elizabeth Thompson https://t.co/2jPejvB8zQ
Razor-sharp piece about Farage at the EU from Marina Hyde - https://t.co/a27uoHkf8M
@pryorlisa excellent take home I say, esp if it tastes better (which I bet it does). I find those healthy branded things usually taste bad
@pryorlisa I hear you. Is it the carrot in the title that is irritating you? feels muffinlike. Although muffins also cake. All cake. So sad.
@pryorlisa but .... it is cake. Sort of to be expected with cake, isn't it?
@katedetweiler I need this. I can always manage 400 minimum but never break 2000. You are amazing.
@katedetweiler 6000 words??? How is that possible??
@JacquelineHarve Looking/not-looking forward to reading that one and sobbing!
@JacquelineHarve too easy to adapt, yr story was a delight. Got teary at my desk when I adapted Chap 16 where Hephz takes off her veil!
@suewhiting4 @JacquelineHarve Hey I was honoured to be asked to write the first episode! It's going to be terrific!
@WazMan01 Oh sorry to hear it!
@pintadoguy you will totally rock it.
@pintadoguy Not gauche, love it.
The #Ghostbusters trailer looks terrific - why all the hate? https://t.co/FwS9dNCwvR
@anthony_mcgowan and lovely pronunciation- 'zs' in Hungarian is 'g' sound from 'genre'. Child of Hungarian, my fave doll was zsuzsi.
Thanks Five Paddington for the wrap dress - you got it just right! I feel like a 70s babe. https://t.co/bDhodf20K0
The people who turn up at Sunday soccer ... @TurnbullMalcolm #abcdeFC https://t.co/x7ui21xxW6
@WeathermanABC sorry to hear it, good luck with such a difficult situation
I'm slapdash with my gin & tonics, and I appreciate this couple's thoroughness. Would love to drink at their house https://t.co/xEocbJWPtQ
Regardless of whether you care about golf, this Tiger Woods feature is a must-read - spans identity, grief, failure. https://t.co/ueZz6UjD2u
@suewhiting4 Congrats! Wonderful news!
Terrific New Yorker article about schizophrenia by Pulitzer-winner Siddhartha Mukherjee https://t.co/L02sL1ABje
@katedetweiler I KNOW, RIGHT? There can never be enough RZ as Jones in the world for me.
@pryorlisa but now I reread my response, it's also ambiguous, can see why you weren't sure. Tone dammit. I did buy the tee though, sriously
@pryorlisa yes, yes I got that.
@pryorlisa clutch your pearls - bought the 'how ya going?' one with koala for myself, in a size 14. I need the koala/Lolita glasses next
@WritersCentreAU Really really good. Please that this exists and want to spread the word!
Just perusing the https://t.co/lozk6zbCHr site for readers, teachers and writers of Australia YA - terrific resource. #LoveOzYA
Gripped by Niki Savva's #RoadtoRuin. Seems hastily written and the prose is sloppy, but still a page-turner. She's the Australian Suetonius.
Glad this is happening... https://t.co/PeCmba2tKt
:O When you ring Medicare and hold for 34 minutes, then accidentally press the END CALL button instead of switching out from speakerphone.
My #StellaSpark? Kate Jennings' Moral Hazard - whole thing is startlingly good, but never read an opening that grabbed me more.
@WilkinsonCarole And Sydney! The train is $17 one way!
@AndieHensley thank you! Ate way too much again but had a blast!
@ozbluey Didn't realise you were a fellow knitter! This jumper is stunning. Must talk yarn one day.
@AndieHensley True it's hard when it's just you and kids. I tend to leave them to it and grab a book, sit beside them while they lego
Darning, drinking tea as I disappear into Carlin's amazing @HardcoreHistory podcast. Stacks of books with time to read. LOVE early Jan.
@AndieHensley Here now - you about? Dinner? Daytime?
@AndieHensley You both look exceptionally cool!
@BrigidWD when Cameron was in Egypt's land .... Let my Cameron go.
@WilkinsonCarole I'm so sorry. I don't know you, but that picture of your dad touched me. Handsome dude.
@frescolicense Sure, most welcome.
@ozbluey I am shattered for the poor owner...
@ozbluey hey bluey, reckon that car is ruined?
Out our front door at Paddo. Sigh. #sydneystorm https://t.co/Iro1ZbbUr1
Transparent Season 2 - thoughtful, heartbreaking, shimmering. Best TV show I've seen. https://t.co/vvhCqdTCch
Love amazing writing? Interested in terrorism in the Philippines? Must read @MattThompson777's Don't Go To Jolo https://t.co/6lnhIFa8u7
@WazMan01 woooot! Congrats! Now I need to cosmically influence the tv producers I want to work with
